authorAttributions.displayName: fuvk you and chu motherfricking toaster

adrFormatAddress: 50 Hudson Yards, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text: A company does not deserve to exist if it invests heavily in deforestation and consistently funds the climate crisis, gun companies, and advocates for "traditional christian values". BlackRock is lining the pockets of the USA government. This company is responsible for our dying planet, the blood of countless children who have been killed by guns, the controlling of women's bodies, and the censoring of people speaking against them. They have investments and control over far too much and need to be stopped.

originalText.text:
I have had enough of companies like this trying to exert their power on everyday people. BlackRock is among several high-powered firms pushing working families out of the housing market and into rentals, therefore depriving them of capital and the opportunity to build credit and equity. Blackrock buys up properties and hikes up rental prices.

This company wields too much power and is pushing its woke agenda through their ESG scoring. Companies who comply like the bank of America, Microsoft etc  get high ESG ratings while companies who do not bend to their will such as Tesla get bad ESG scores. (ESG: Environmental, Social, Governance) only 1 out of 155 companies invested in by blackrock had shown a reduction in Their Carbon footprint. This shows that they have no integrity.

This company is contributing the rapid decline of the west. Values are going out of the window and being replaced by a "woke" agenda.

originalText.text: Despite claiming to be a climate leader, BlackRock has continued to fund fossil fuel projects that are helping to accelerate Earth's climate disaster. BlackRock (and other firms) need to consider this planet's sustainability and fund sustainable green energy projects. We, the people, need you to find other ways to make your profit. Please.

BlackRock (and other firms) need to consider this planet's sustainability and fund sustainable green energy projects. We, the people, need you to find other ways to make your profit. Please.

originalText.text: This company claims to care about people while it continues to invest in climate destruction, particularly in deforestation that impacts indigenous people. Shame on BlackRock!

text.text: This company claims to care about people while it continues to invest in climate destruction, particularly in deforestation that impacts indigenous people. Shame on BlackRock!

originalText.text: It's important that folks know that BlackRock's commitment to creating "community spaces" is also paired with investments into fossil fuel and deforestation projects -- industries that harm all of us. If we do not have a livable world, the social impact of offering community spaces will be null and void. I'm challenging BlackRock to do better, stand with marginalized communities, and divest from ALL fossil fuel and deforestation projects!
